column4: It is actually already there, I forget where though, remember wubi is a file in windows, and set for a try out not longterm use.
Basically it is subject to problems with a hard shutdown, it is just a file in windows.
Here is what the designer of wubi says if its of any help.  http://howsoftwareisbuilt.com/2009/03/12/interview-with-agostino-russo-wubi-ubuntu/
